Source: The Finnish government and major creditors of bankrupt shipyard Waertsilae Marine Industries Oy
Target: a new company to complete most of the troubled shipyard 's backlog of 15 ships

text: The Finnish government and major creditors of bankrupt shipyard Waertsilae Marine Industries Oy agreed in principle to form a new company to complete most of the troubled shipyard 's backlog of 15 ships .
